column1: Baby Barnaby's////This was my first time going to baby Barnabys
column2: and I was impressed. The place is small and cozy
column3: so small that they only had 2 waitresses
column4: but they were friendly and efficient. The food was simply awesome. I had the steak and eggs and I must say
column5: the best I ever had. Â The steak was marinated
column6: and tasted like it was griiled on a smoke pit. Speaking of smoke they also served smoked bacon which was also delicious (I always try the bacon at every restaurant I go). And don't let me forget about the freshly squeezed orange juice they serve and when I say fresh
column7: I mean they go and squeeze you a glass when you order it. All in all this is one of the best breakfast places in town
column8: but don't take my word for it
column9: check it out yourself ....they close at 2.
